snippet: Alessandro Ballan of Italy, a former world champion cyclist, was barred for two years for blood doping and was fired by the BMC team.
lead_paragraph: Alessandro Ballan of Italy, a former world champion cyclist, was barred for two years for blood doping and was fired by the BMC team.

headline.main: Ballan, Suspended for Doping, Is Fired
headline.print_headline: Ballan, Suspended for Doping, Is Fired
